name: E52/中部横断自動車道
description:
E52/中部横断自動車道 About

"E52" is Japanese Expressway Simulator. 
Take the Chubu-Odan Expressway from Shizuoka to Yamanashi.

play time  : ~1 hours

How To Play

W Acceleration
S   Brake/Reverse
Mouse Turning Left/Right
F1/F2/F3/F4  Switch Camera
Enter Turn the car over (used in case of an accident)
Backspace Rewind for 10sec (used in case of an accident)

What's Expressways? Hint
  • Let's play while playing your favorite music.
  • F1 camera if you want to concentrate on driving.
  • F2 camera if you want to enjoy the scenery.
  • Use the Enter key when the car rolls over.
  • If something bad happens, use the Backspace key to rewind time.

---

  • お気に入りの音楽を流しながらプレイしよう
  • 運転に集中したいならF1カメラ
  • 風景を楽しみたいならF2カメラ
  • 車が横転したらEnterキーを使おう
  • 取り返しがつかなくなったらBackspaceキーで時間を巻き戻そう
